briefdescription.para: List of bodies w.r.t. which the bodies in bodiesToIntegrate_ are propagated.
List of bodies for which the translational state is to be propagated.
Type of translational state propagator to be used.
A map containing the list of settings for the accelerations acting on each body.

detaileddescription.para: A map containing the list of settings for the accelerations acting on each body, identifying the body being acted on and the body acted on by an acceleration. The map has as key a string denoting the name of the body the list of accelerations, provided as the value corresponding to a key, is acting on. This map-value is again a map with string as key, denoting the body exerting the acceleration, and as value a pointer to an acceleration settings object.

briefdescription.para: A map containing the list of accelerations acting on each body.

detaileddescription.para: A map containing the list of accelerations acting on each body, identifying the body being acted on and the body acted on by an acceleration. The map has as key a string denoting the name of the body the list of accelerations, provided as the value corresponding to a key, is acting on. This map-value is again a map with string as key, denoting the body exerting the acceleration, and as value a pointer to an acceleration model.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< std::string > &centralBodies, const basic_astrodynamics::AccelerationMap &accelerationsMap, const std::vector< std::string > &bodiesToIntegrate, const Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, Eigen::Dynamic, 1 > &initialBodyStates, const std::shared_ptr< PropagationTerminationSettings > terminationSettings, const TranslationalPropagatorType propagator=cowell, const std::shared_ptr< DependentVariableSaveSettings > dependentVariablesToSave=std::shared_ptr< DependentVariableSaveSettings >(), const double printInterval=TUDAT_NAN)
memberdef.name: TranslationalStatePropagatorSettings

briefdescription.para: Constructor for generic stopping conditions, providing an alreay-created accelerations map.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor for generic stopping conditions, providing an alreay-created accelerations map.
centralBodies
List of bodies w.r.t. which the bodies in bodiesToIntegrate_ are propagated.
accelerationsMap
A map containing the list of accelerations acting on each body, identifying the body being acted on and the body acted on by an acceleration. The map has as key a string denoting the name of the body the list of accelerations, provided as the value corresponding to a key, is acting on. This map-value is again a map with string as key, denoting the body exerting the acceleration, and as value a pointer to an acceleration model.
bodiesToIntegrate
List of bodies for which the translational state is to be propagated.
initialBodyStates
Initial state used as input for numerical integration
terminationSettings
Settings for creating the object that checks whether the propagation is finished.
propagator
Type of translational state propagator to be used
dependentVariablesToSave
Settings for the dependent variables that are to be saved during propagation (default none).
printInterval
Variable indicating how often (once per printInterval_ seconds or propagation independenty variable) the current state and time are to be printed to console (default never).

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< std::string > &centralBodies, const simulation_setup::SelectedAccelerationMap &accelerationSettingsMap, const std::vector< std::string > &bodiesToIntegrate, const Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, Eigen::Dynamic, 1 > &initialBodyStates, const std::shared_ptr< PropagationTerminationSettings > terminationSettings, const TranslationalPropagatorType propagator=cowell, const std::shared_ptr< DependentVariableSaveSettings > dependentVariablesToSave=std::shared_ptr< DependentVariableSaveSettings >(), const double printInterval=TUDAT_NAN)
memberdef.name: TranslationalStatePropagatorSettings

briefdescription.para: Constructor for fixed propagation time stopping conditions, providing an alreay-created accelerations map.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor for fixed propagation time stopping conditions, providing an alreay-created accelerations map.
centralBodies
List of bodies w.r.t. which the bodies in bodiesToIntegrate_ are propagated.
accelerationsMap
A map containing the list of accelerations acting on each body, identifying the body being acted on and the body acted on by an acceleration. The map has as key a string denoting the name of the body the list of accelerations, provided as the value corresponding to a key, is acting on. This map-value is again a map with string as key, denoting the body exerting the acceleration, and as value a pointer to an acceleration model.
bodiesToIntegrate
List of bodies for which the translational state is to be propagated.
initialBodyStates
Initial state used as input for numerical integration
endTime
Time at which to stop the numerical propagation
propagator
Type of translational state propagator to be used
dependentVariablesToSave
Settings for the dependent variables that are to be saved during propagation (default none).
printInterval
Variable indicating how often (once per printInterval_ seconds or propagation independenty variable) the current state and time are to be printed to console (default never).

briefdescription.para: Class for defining settings for propagating translational dynamics.

detaileddescription.para: Class for defining settings for propagating translational dynamics. The propagator defines the form of the equations of motion (i.e. Cowell, Encke, Gauss etc.). This base class can be used for Cowell propagator. Other propagators have dedicated derived class.
